member.name: TrackInformation
member.summary: Contains the current track number and duration as part of the PositionInformation obtained from the DMR.

member.name: TrackInformation.Track
member.summary: The current track number as reported by DMR. If the DMR does not have a concept of track numbers, this value will be 0.

member.name: TrackInformation.TrackDuration
member.summary: The duration of the current track.
